dialogueText: By the time you have defeated this fresh wave of Dreamless, Dorothy has disappeared again.
You call her name, but she doesn't answer.
Perhaps she is trying to maintain this dream world again and stop it from collapsing?
You wander alone through the static landscape until another unexpected face appears.
Oh! Dreamer!
I'm so pleased to see you! What are you doing here?
What are you doing here? What is ALICE doing here?!
How did she get into Dorothy's dream?
This is a dream? I had no idea!
Are you sure this is Dorothy's dream? Perhaps it's actually your dream.
The thought had occurred to you.
I know whose dream I would prefer to be in...
Hehe!
Ah... right...
But is this the real Alice? Or are you just dreaming her?
Am I real, or a dream? Why can't I be both, Dreamer?
She winks at you.
If she is the real Alice, then she can tell you about how she tried to leave Phantasia.
You mean, how I wasn't able to?
Yes. She kind of got cut off by Aurora that time she was explaining it.
Ah, of course... Aurora...
Well, Dreamer, if you must know about her...
Aurora was very interested in my experience.
And she was very interested in you...
You get the feeling Alice isn't too happy about that.
Well, I'll tell you what I told her.
When I was trapped between the worlds of Phantasia and... beyond... I had the very unpleasant feeling that I was beginning to dissolve.
At that moment, I saw... images... things I can't remember and that I barely understood. People I didn't know...
And I heard a voice. A sad voice, repeating a name, over and over.
What name was it?
The name was 'Aurora'.
Aurora?!
Yes. She had the same reaction when I told her that. She looked very shocked.
She asked me for more but I couldn't-
There is a snarl.
Dorothy's dream world seems to shift and suddenly there are Nightmares leaping through the air towards you!
Dreamer!
문 너머는 문밖과 비슷한 모습이었다.
머리 위에 떠 있는 구름은 여전히 흘러가지 않고
바람 한 점 불지 않는 숲도 고요하기만 하다.
그때, 머리 위에서 누군가가 뚝 떨어졌다.
아얏! 대체 누가 나를 부른 건가 했더니...
... 히, 그렇게 내가 보고 싶었어? 이런 식으로 부르는 방법이 있을 줄이야, 새로워서 좋네.
앨리스?
어떻게 나타난 거지? 여긴 도로시가 만든 세계라고 했는데...
맙소사, 꿈꾸는 자! 벌써 잊어버렸어?
앞으로 언제든지 네 곁으로 돌아올 수 있다고 했잖아, 너도 항상 내 곁으로 돌아오게 될 거라고!
손뼉을 친 앨리스가 내 손을 붙잡고 왈츠를 추듯 한 바퀴를 빙글 돌았다.
네가 날 필요로 하는 소리가 들렸어.
그거, 아주 잘 들리더라... 달콤하더라?
원더랜드의 새 도미니언이 된 만큼 좀 더 진중해졌을 거라고 생각했었는데
앨리스는 이전에 만났을 때와 변한 게 전혀 없어 보였다.
그나저나, 여기는... 네 꿈속일까~? 아니면 다른 누군가의 꿈?
가슴팍에 꽂아둔 도로시의 꽃을 쏙 빼낸 앨리스가 장난스레 웃었다.
그것을 뒤로 휙 던져버리는 얼굴이 천진난만하다.
뭐어, 이런 건 필요 없지? 네 옆에는 내가 있을 테니까.
도로시가 가지고 있으라고 말했는데... 괜찮을지 모르겠다.
설마... 내가 옆에 있는데 다른 아이를 생각하는 건 아니지? 나, 속상할지도.
아차, 그렇지. 네가 듣고 싶어 하는 이야기를 들려줄게.
지난번에 헤어질 때, 오로라 때문에 네게 들려주지 못한 이야기가 있잖아?
오직 나만이 너에게 해줄 수 있는 이야기잖아. 특별하지?
앨리스가 섬뜩한 얼굴로 천천히 미소 짓는다.
심연, 공허. 어떤 이름이라도 좋아, 판타지아의 경계에는 무서운 것이 살고 있다더라...
심연의 그림자에 닿은 것들을 전부, 전부 녹여 하나로 만드는 것이 있다더라...
하나가 되는 것의 짜릿함을, 그 충족감을, 그 사랑을! 이해한다고 하더라...
사랑에 굶주린 아이처럼 누군가의 이름을, 부르고 있다더라...?
앨리스가 고개를 숙여 내 귓가에 작게 속삭인다.
그 목소리가 애타게 부르던 이름은...
오로라, 였다고 하더라...?
순간 앨리스가 손을 뻗어 내 입을 틀어막았다.
쉿, 네가 그 이름을 부르면 그녀가 이 꿈에 간섭할 수 있게 될 거야.
나는 모처럼 얻은 기회를 놓치고 싶진 않거든.
붉어진 뺨을 수줍게 문지르던 앨리스가 순간 매서운 눈으로 숲 가장자리를 똑바로 바라본다.
도로시가 열었던 것과 같은 형태의 문이 나타나더니, 안에서 검은 손 같은 것이 튀어나왔다.
... 히. 감히, 나와 너를 방해하는 것들은, 모조리, 없애버려도 괜찮은 거지?
By the time you have defeated this fresh wave of Dreamless, Dorothy has disappeared again.
You call her name, but she doesn't answer.
Perhaps she is trying to maintain this dream world again and stop it from collapsing?
You wander alone through the static landscape until another unexpected face appears.
Oh! Dreamer!
I'm so pleased to see you! What are you doing here?

Are you sure this is Dorothy's dream? Perhaps it's actually your dream.
The thought had occurred to you.
I know whose dream I would prefer to be in...
Hehe!
Ah... right...
But is this the real Alice? Or are you just dreaming her?

She winks at you.
If she is the real Alice, then she can tell you about how she tried to leave Phantasia.
You mean, how I wasn't able to?
Yes. She kind of got cut off by Aurora that time she was explaining it.
Ah, of course... Aurora...

Aurora was very interested in my experience.
And she was very interested in you...

Well, I'll tell you what I told her.
When I was trapped between the worlds of Phantasia and... beyond... I had the very unpleasant feeling that I was beginning to dissolve.
At that moment, I saw... images... things I can't remember and that I barely understood. People I didn't know...
And I heard a voice. A sad voice, repeating a name, over and over.
What name was it?
The name was 'Aurora'.
Aurora?!
Yes. She had the same reaction when I told her that. She looked very shocked.
She asked me for more but I couldn't-
There is a snarl.
Dorothy's dream world seems to shift and suddenly there are Nightmares leaping through the air towards you!
Dreamer!
